goals__remit: Trifarma is a company engaged in the field of developing, manufacturing and supplying Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (API), intermediates . Trifarma has  AIFA, FDA and PMDA inspected facilities. Worldwide sales mainly in regulated markets such as USA and Europe.
